ro.eminescusm.pm.mock.external.telemetry

Interface Telemetry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TelemetryImpl

    public interface Telemetry
    Instances of Telemetry provide a means by which data can be transmitted from the robot controller to the driver station and displayed on the driver station screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Telemetry.Item
      Instances of Telemetry.Item represent an item of data on the driver station telemetry display.
      static interface  Telemetry.Line
      Instances of Telemetry.Line build lines of data on the driver station telemetry display.
      static interface  Telemetry.Log
      The Telemetry.Log in a Telemetry instance provides an append-only list of messages that appear on the driver station below the Telemetry.Items of the Telemetry

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      In addition to items and lines, a telemetry may also contain a list of actions

      Adds an item to the end of the telemetry being built for the driver station display

      Creates and returns a new line in the receiver Telemetry

      Creates and returns a new line in the receiver Telemetry
      void clear()
      Removes all items from the receiver whose value is not to be retained

      Removes all items from the receiver, including those whose value is to be retained

      Answers whether clear() is automatically called after each call to update()

      Returns the log of this Telemetry to which log entries may be appended

      Sets the minimum interval between transmissions of telemetry to the driver station
      boolean update()
      Updates the driver station display if the minimum interval has elapsed since the last update

      • addAction

        java.lang.Object addAction(java.lang.Runnable action)
        In addition to items and lines, a telemetry may also contain a list of actions
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be added
        Returns:
        a token by which the action may be removed

      • addData

        <T> Telemetry.Item addData(java.lang.String caption,
                           Func<T> valueProducer)
        Adds an item to the end of the telemetry being built for the driver station display
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value to be displayed
        Parameters:
        caption - the caption to be displayed with the data item
        valueProducer - function which produces the value to be displayed
        Returns:
        the newly created data item

                           java.lang.String format,
                           Func<T> valueProducer)

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the value to be displayed
        Parameters:
        caption - the caption to be displayed with the data item
        format - the format string to be used to format the value

        Returns:

      • update
